front.title: •Tendau Bendon
front.gametext: Agendas: justice, peace. While in a senate majority, if you have at least one card in hand, once during your control phase may place your hand in Used Pile to draw up to four cards from Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Ithorian senator. Called on by his people to represent them in the Senate, though his heart is not in politics. Voted against the taxation of trade routes.

combo: Tendau Bendon + Plea To The Court Cancel a Force drain and protect your characters from weapons!

Tendau Bendon + Yoda Stew The perfect late-game combo. Stew on his turn to place 4 you want in Force Pile. Bendon on your control phase to move the rest of your hand into Used. Now you are good shape "differentially", and you can draw back the 1-4 you actually want!
